list_definition.definition: a small golden-yellow fish often kept as a pet

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The child kept a goldfish in a bowl.

list_ex_of_english: Evidence from thymidine labeling for continuing growth of the retina and tectum in juvenile goldfish.
Tetrodotoxin inhibits the formation of refined retinotopography in goldfish.
Cannabinoids modulate the cone light response in goldfish.
Activity sharpens the map during the regeneration of the retinotectal projection in goldfish.
Responsivity and absolute sensitivity of retinal ganglion cells in goldfish of different sizes, when measured under "psychophysical" conditions.
Large-scale synaptic errors during map formation by regenerating optic axons in the goldfish.
Electrical resonance and calcium influx in the synaptic terminal of depolarizing bipolar cells from the goldfish retina.
Throughout the years, we have obtained precise descriptions of the response properties of cones and horizontal cells and their interactions in the goldfish retina.
